posts.post_content:
I am down to just a handful of Obak catchers that I  am looking to add to my collection:


Seeking the following T212-1 1909 Obaks:

Charlie Graham, Sacramento
R. Williams, San Francisco
Carl Lewis, Oakland

Seeking the following T212-2 1910 Obaks:

Carl Lewis, Vancouver, N.W.L.
 
Seeking the following T212-3 1911 Obaks:

Tom Hasty, Spokane, N.W.L.
Carl Lewis, Vancouver, N.W.L.
William Pearce, Oakland, PC.L.

Please email me at [url]vintagecatcher@myfairpoint.net[/url] if you have any available. I can purchase outright or I also am open to trade for cards I need.

Thanks in advance,

Patrick
